channel.title: CiTR -- And Sometimes Why (2008)
channel.description: And Sometimes Why features the best in independent music, with a strong focus on female singers/ songwriters/ singer-songwriters/ composers/musicians. Faves include: Hanne Hukkelberg, Noriko Tujiko, Fiery Furnaces, Great Aunt Ida, Tracy and the Plastics, Mascott. Beautiful music rules.
channel.itunes:summary: And Sometimes Why features the best in independent music, with a strong focus on female singers/ songwriters/ singer-songwriters/ composers/musicians. Faves include: Hanne Hukkelberg, Noriko Tujiko, Fiery Furnaces, Great Aunt Ida, Tracy and the Plastics, Mascott. Beautiful music rules.
channel.itunes:author: CiTR 101.9 Vancouver
channel.itunes:subtitle: Independent music

item.title: Broadcast on 03-Dec-2008
item.description: a retrospective of "hits" played on the show over the years. things haven't changed much since miko the mumbly teenager to miko the now, but it's been fun. thanks for listening, y'all.
item.itunes:subtitle: the last 'and sometimes why' episode! RIP, 1993-2008

item.title: Broadcast on 05-Nov-2008
item.description: Songs from Vivian Girls, Love is All, All Girl Summer Fun Band, Lambchop, Deerhoof, and much, much more.
item.itunes:subtitle: Lotsa new music! And flaky host.

item.title: Broadcast on 01-Oct-2008
item.description: New music from Kellarissa, Tracy Shedd, Laura Barrett, and much more
item.itunes:subtitle: More of that indie pop goodness

item.title: Broadcast on 02-Jul-2008
item.description: New music by Notwist, No Kids, Wedding Present, Sigur Ros & more!

item.title: Broadcast on 04-Jun-2008
item.description: new music from Destroyer, Tilly and the Wall, Devastations, Thao, Shugo Tokumaru, and more!

item.title: Broadcast on 02-Apr-2008
item.description: Lotsa new music, including A Weather, Ida, Veda Hille, Destroyer, No Kids...
item.itunes:subtitle: Happy Spring-Winter!

item.title: Broadcast on 05-Mar-2008
item.description: special sets of lo-fi, indie stuff from obscure K, KRS, teenbeat comps + new music by veda hille, ida and more!
item.itunes:subtitle: happy international women's day 2008!

item.title: Broadcast on 06-Feb-2008
item.description: New music from Magnetic Fields, Cat Power, Tender Forever, Susanna plus old music from Ida, Versus, Tiger Trap -- and more!

item.title: Broadcast on 02-Jan-2008
item.description: a bit upbeat, a bit uplifting, a bit sad ... to reflect on the past year, and ring in the new one!
item.itunes:subtitle: happy new year(?)

item.title: Broadcast on 05-Dec-2007
item.description: Holiday/wintery tunes by Low, burquitlam plaza, New Pornographers, Softies & more, plus ROCK set by Doretta!
item.itunes:subtitle: Holiday special with guest co-host Doretta Lau!

item.title: Broadcast on 07-Nov-2007
item.description: taken by trees, new buffalo, tullycraft, portico, fiery furnaces, scout niblett (duet with will oldham) & more!
item.itunes:subtitle: new music!

item.title: Broadcast on 03-Oct-2007
item.description: special guest Nick Krgovich brings some of his favourite lo-fi pop songs to play for you! incl. obscure '80s bands, japanese pop, and more!
item.itunes:subtitle: citr funding drive show!

item.title: Broadcast on 15-Aug-2007
item.description: new(ish) music by mirah, mary timony band, electrelane, emma pollock, shugo tokumaru, and more

item.title: Broadcast on 06-Jun-2007
item.description: indie rock hits, including bill callahan, joanna newsom, mary timony, cocorosie, calvin johnson, cornelius, shapes & sizes, choir practice, & more!
item.itunes:subtitle: lotsa new music!!

item.title: Broadcast on 02-May-2007
item.description: New CanCon and an hour dedicated to explorAsian
item.itunes:subtitle: Asian Heritage Month special!
